remarks: Properties that determine a group.  Read ` N ` as ` N ( x ) ` .  Note: This theorem has hard-coded structure indices for demonstration purposes.  It is not intended for general use. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2011.)
statement:
isgrpix.a $e |- B e. _V $.
isgrpix.b $e |- .+ e. _V $.
isgrpix.g $e |- G = { <. 1 , B >. , <. 2 , .+ >. } $.
isgrpix.2 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. B ) $.
isgrpix.3 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ z e. B ) -> ( ( x .+ y ) .+ z ) = ( x .+ ( y .+ z ) ) ) $.
isgrpix.z $e |- .0. e. B $.
isgrpix.5 $e |- ( x e. B -> ( .0. .+ x ) = x ) $.
isgrpix.6 $e |- ( x e. B -> N e. B ) $.
isgrpix.7 $e |- ( x e. B -> ( N .+ x ) = .0. ) $.
isgrpix $p |- G e. Grp $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .0. x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d N y $.
